page.title: 20IMPRESSIONS OF THE D-BLOCK
page.content: I think we have quite a lot of{clinics and{hospitals}in the area but I would like to see them better equipped. My local{doctor}is very understanding but I don't like my{dentist! The{police}here are very friendly and helpfull, as all policemen should be. { Gateshead Stadium}is of great use to the people of the North East and isn't far away. It has attracted many top athletes. I enjoy shopping, despite the absence of a large area of shops like the one in Newcastle({ELDON SQUARE}) I would love the buses to run on time! And I would like to see the Metro extended to Low Fell. Bicycle lanes would reduce the number of accidents dramatically. By Emma Barrow.A junior school pupil
